text: Seeing this game on many GOTY lists made me curious and when I saw it was a free visual novel on Steam, I knew something was up. Without reading anything on it, I played it recently and now understand the buzz. It's definitely not what it looks like. Watching the Game Theory videos about this game afterwards opened my eyes even more and is what confirmed that I needed to put it in my Top 10. I won't say anything more!

author: Dalton McBleh

text:
Beginners guide:
Sayori: Always jolly and kind to everyone, she really likes to hang around.
Yuri: The polite and shy type, but really passionate about some topics. Her rap skills are sharp as a knife.
Natsuki: Standard Tsundere at first, but she's actually a family person, her father is really special to her. 
Monika: Oh, it's just Monika.

text:
So this is not a Top 10 2017 VGM list but a Top 10 2017 VG list represented by your favorite (?) track from each game?
